sentence: The committee also subpoenaed Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate and state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R), Arizona GOP chairwoman Kelli Ward, former Michigan Republican State Committee chairwoman Laura Cox and Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem (R), who is also a member of the far-right militia group the Oath Keepers.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Trump Campaign Officials Over Fake Electors Scheme

sentence: The latest bevy of subpoenas includes those sent to Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano and Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem, two Trump allies who the committee says boosted efforts to send alternate electors who would vote for Trump.
author: Virginia Aabram
title: 'False electors' targeted in new round of Jan. 6 committee subpoenas

sentence: Lou Barletta, a former congressman and one of two front-runners in the race, has said he would sign any bill that comes to my desk that would protect the life of the unborn.? Another top candidate, Doug Mastriano, said in a recent debate that he was opposed to any exceptions for rape, incest or the health of the mother in an abortion ban.
title: Midterms Biggest Abortion Battleground: Pennsylvania

sentence: State senator Doug Mastriano, who ahead of the Tuesday primary, said at a recent debate that he would oppose any exceptions to an abortion ban, such as for rape, incest or the safety of the mother.
author: Joan E Greve
title: Abortion rights: how a governors veto can protect womens freedoms

sentence: One of those bills, a six-week ban that would effectively block the majority of abortions, was introduced in the state Senate by Doug Mastriano, a candidate endorsed by former President Trump who is leading the field heading into Tuesdays Republican gubernatorial primary.
author: Arit John
title: Pennsylvania governors race could have outsize impact on abortion access

sentence: And in Pennsylvanias GOP race for governor, Trumps endorsed candidate, the far-right Doug Mastriano, easily won the nomination though he was already well ahead in the polls when Trump weighed in just days before the primary.
author: Associated Press
title: Biden invokes Defense Production Act for baby formula shortage

sentence: There, Republican primary voters nominated extremist Doug Mastriano for governor.
author: Dennis Aftergut
title: Rays of a much-needed, principled GOP shine through

sentence: It's not just the election truthers who are winning GOP backing in key races, like the two candidates for Michigan attorney general and secretary of state, and Pennsylvania gubernatorial nominee Doug Mastriano; there are also subtler and lower-profile instances.
author: Aaron Blake
title: Trump's GOP election purge marches on, despite setbacks in Georgia

sentence: But it is only one such threat: From anti-voting legislation enacted on the basis of Trumps lies to a gubernatorial candidate in Pennsylvanias Doug Mastriano who has indicated he would not respect election results, Republicans are building on the former presidents 2020 efforts to overturn his loss.
author: Eric Lutz
title: Steve Bannon's Election-Takeover Dream Is Starting to Take Shape
